since my comment yesterday i found a crack that works perfectly - no more 'Invalid Serial Number' messages!!!

GOTO: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6076932/Adobe_Photoshop_CS5_Extended_Activator_by_Carlos_Manuel_Virus_FR

btw i didn't open the 'Open This.bat' first as instructed (see the Readme in the download) but it worked anyway
To patch the host files in windows 7, open notepad by right clicking and then selecting run as administrator, then go file, open, navigate to the host file and edit it.
compleetly downloaded in less than 10 min

to run this program whitout any problems downlaod a firewall (i use comodo) and block "C:\Program Files\Adobe\Adobe Photoshop CS5 (64 Bit)\Photoshop.exe" from internet
(it doesnt say 64 Bit if you use a 32 Bit)
